trans-unit.source: Represents a configuration element that controls authentication parameters for the HTTP transport.
trans-unit.target: 表示控制 HTTP 傳輸的驗證參數的組態項目。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Configuration.HttpTransportSecurityElement"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新執行個體<xref href="System.ServiceModel.Configuration.HttpTransportSecurityElement"></xref>類別。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the type of client credential to be used for authentication.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定要用來驗證用戶端認證類型。

trans-unit.source: The type of client credential to be used for authentication.
trans-unit.target: 要用來驗證用戶端認證類型。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets an <xref href="System.Security.Authentication.ExtendedProtection.Configuration.ExtendedProtectionPolicyElement"></xref> instance which contains the configuration settings to use for extended protection for a session.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定<xref href="System.Security.Authentication.ExtendedProtection.Configuration.ExtendedProtectionPolicyElement"></xref>執行個體，包含要使用的組態設定擴充保護的工作階段。

trans-unit.source: An <xref href="System.Security.Authentication.ExtendedProtection.Configuration.ExtendedProtectionPolicyElement"></xref> instance which contains the configuration settings to use for extended protection for a session.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Security.Authentication.ExtendedProtection.Configuration.ExtendedProtectionPolicyElement"> </xref>執行個體，包含要使用的組態設定擴充保護的工作階段。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the type of client credential to be used for authentication against the proxy.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定要用於驗證 proxy 的用戶端認證類型。

trans-unit.source: The type of client credential to be used for authentication against the proxy.
trans-unit.target: 要用於驗證 proxy 的用戶端認證類型。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the authentication realm for digest or basic authentication.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定摘要式或基本驗證的驗證領域。

trans-unit.source: An authentication realm is a string that contains at least the name of the host performing the authentication.
trans-unit.target: 驗證領域就是主機的至少包含執行驗證名稱的字串。

trans-unit.source: It can also specify a collection of users that has access.
trans-unit.target: 它也可以指定具有存取權的使用者集合。

trans-unit.source: A user can query the authentication realm to understand which one of the several possible usernames and passwords can be used.
trans-unit.target: 使用者可以查詢驗證領域，以了解可以使用其中的幾個可能的使用者名稱和密碼。
